CmdLine: wget -q -O - https://dl-ssl.google.com/linux/linux_signing_key.pub | apt-key add - &&     sh -c 'echo "deb [arch=amd64] http://dl.google.com/linux/chrome/deb/ stable main" >> /etc/apt/sources.list.d/google.list' &&     apt-get update &&     apt-get install -y google-chrome-stable
Commands.Name: run
